00032 class SourceFunc
00033 {
00034 
00035 public:
00036     SourceFunc(){};
00037 
00038     virtual double get_value(double time)=0;
00039   
00040 };
00041 
00043 class DCSource: public SourceFunc
00044 {
00045  
00046 private:
00047     double dc_value;
00048   
00049 public:
00050     DCSource(double _value):dc_value(_value){};
00051 
00052     
00053     double get_value(double time){return dc_value;};
00054 };

00057 class PWLSource: public SourceFunc

00059

00061     double* values; //the values at each time point

00063
